```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
```
```{r}
left_join(CardBase, 
          CustomerBase,
          by = "Cust_ID")
```
```{r}
inner_join(FraudBase, 
          TransactionBase,
          by = "Transaction_ID")
```
```{r}
semi_join(CardBase, 
          TransactionBase,
          by = c("Card_Number" = "Credit_Card_ID"))
```
```{r}
hats_cleaned <- hat_observations %>% 
  separate(observation, 
           into = c("hat_colour", "hat_type"),
           sep = ","
  ) %>% 
  unite(day, month, year,
        col = "Date",
        sep = "/")
```
```{r}
berets <- hats_cleaned %>% 
  filter(hat_type == "beret")

berets %>% 
  arrange(desc(observation_count))
```
